nodes.text: Iskrila was a female Human who served in the Republic Army during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. She was stationed aboard Carrick Station.

Iskrila appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Belsavis Modification Commendations Vendor on Carrick Station, though she was later relabeled as a Level 42 Modification Commendations Vendor. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Iskrila now also appears on a number of worlds in the place of the original armor, weapon, and mods vendors.
